sentences.en: A documentary draft offers greater security to the exporter.
sentences.cn: 跟单汇票对出口商来说更为保险.

sentences.en: A former food exporter, zaire have to import food now.
sentences.cn: 扎伊尔过去是个粮食出口国, 现在却要进口粮食.

sentences.en: China will shove Germany off its pedestal as the world's biggest exporter.
sentences.cn: 中国将取代德国成为世界上最大的出口国.

sentences.en: China will shove Germany pedestal as the world's biggest exporter.
sentences.cn: 中国将会挤掉德国一举成为世界上的最大出口国.

sentences.en: Distributors are called exclusive if they are under contract to sell only the exporter's products.
sentences.cn: 经销商如按合同只销售该出口商的产品,他们就称为独家经销商.

sentences.en: For example, Australia, a major quick wheat exporter faces a drought.
sentences.cn: 例如小麦主要出口国之一的澳大利亚正面临这干旱.

sentences.en: France is the world's second-biggest exporter of agricultural products.
sentences.cn: 法国是世界第二大农产品出口国。

sentences.en: It was the country's largest oil exporter last year.
sentences.cn: 去年它是该国最大的石油出口商.

sentences.en: Switzerland is a big exporter of watches.
The bank cannot be reimbursed by the exporter if the importer fails to pay.
sentences.cn: 如果进口商不付款,则银行不能向出口商追偿款额.

sentences.en: The country is a net exporter of food.
The exporter can enter into consignment transaction.
The exporter may request an amendment.
The next step occurs when the exporter draws a draft on an opening bank.
sentences.cn: 下一步就是出口商向开证行业立汇票.

sentences.en: Vietnam has emerged as the world's third-biggest rice exporter.
sentences.cn: 越南已跃居世界第三大稻米出口国。

sentences.en: When a high - cost importing country becomes an exporter, potential gains from trade are wasted.
sentences.cn: 当成本高的进口国成为出口国后, 贸易的潜在利益也就被浪费了.

trans.tran_en: a person, company, or country that sells goods to another country
